definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Splendid cake, covered with cupids, silver, and true-lover's knots.
sentences.chinese: 用爱神，银纸，同心结等装饰着的上等蛋糕。

sentences.english: Embracing by glamorous light, the meteor is under the wings of Cupid.
sentences.chinese: 被一群光芒所包围的流星，是被爱神翅膀所保护的。

sentences.english: Who, at the peak of happiness, can remember the number of Cupid.
sentences.chinese: 在幸福的峰巅，谁还记得住爱神的电话号码。

sentences.english: Aphrodite, the Greek goddness of love, is fabled to have been born of the foam of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 希腊爱神阿美罗狄蒂据说是诞生于海浪泡沫之中。

sentences.english: One of the charming little Loves is already fairly spitted.
sentences.chinese: 在那些娇小可爱的爱神中，已有一个被注射器扎通了。

sentences.english: I can claim to love God.
Here is the Goddess of Love Forest.
Hao Bin as Eros, meanwhile, left everybody astonished.
sentences.chinese: 而郝斌饰演的爱神给人留下了震撼的映像。

sentences.english: A long time ago, Apollo was the god of light.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，阿波罗是太阳神，伊洛斯是爱神。

sentences.english: They're cupids, Mr. Daley. Gods of love.
sentences.chinese: 他们是丘比特，戴利先生，是爱神。

sentences.english: It loves , even like Love , its deep heart is full.
sentences.chinese: 它甚至像爱神一样地去爱，爱已满贮它心灵的深处。

sentences.english: Or do you see what that person can become when forgiven by God and given the opportunity to show love to God?
sentences.chinese: 还是看到蒙神赦免和有机会以行动爱神的他？

sentences.english: To wayt on Love amongst his lovely crew;
sentences.chinese: 侍奉爱神去充当可爱的仆人。

sentences.english: Any goal that causes you to love God more brings glory to God.
sentences.chinese: 任何使你更爱神的目标会把荣耀归给神。

sentences.english: Venus ratio with shoot arrow in the curved bow.
sentences.chinese: 爱神丘比特正在弯弓射箭。

definition: Cupid, son of Venus and Mars, Roman god of love and beauty
Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
God (in Catholicism)/abbr. for 天主教[Tian1 zhu3 jiao4], Catholicism
feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
